attributes.title: Interesting
attributes.review: I downloaded this app because I’m in love with Obama  he’s like my sugar baby but what I saw terrified me.  Instead of Obama I saw this orange looking thing. Till this day I still see in my dreams and everywhere I go. I would not recommend.

attributes.title: y’all fr with this app?
attributes.review: i literally gaged when i say the picture of a orange guy. i still scared to this day and i have been going to therapy for the past three weeks. the app doesn’t work and will never work. periodT

attributes.title: Horrible👹
attributes.review: I got this app to see how to bake a cake and the instructions were so unclear that my hamster was in the oven!! Good thing i saw that little guy before he popped. My toaster is also giving birth in a few days so wish us luck🤞🏼

attributes.title: Don’t download it
attributes.review: After downloading my phone has been sending notifications at all time it annoying and it take al lot of time to start working.

attributes.title: absolutely horrible
attributes.review: upon opening this app i was met with an onslaught of advertisements that made my iphone 11 pro lag severely and made me unable to exit the app. i was also told that my downloading this app i would receive $500 compensation but alas, i have yet to receive my money and thus i will be uninstalling the app. keep your inefficient, hacked app to yourself. i wish there was an option to give zero stars.

When I opened this app I was petrified and when I say petrified I almost dieeeed the first thing that popped up was this big ugly looking orange  holding up a fist lemme tell you I threw my phone when I saw that and it cracked 1/5 don’t recommend !!!

attributes.title: trash. absolute trash.
attributes.review: This asked for my location right away which to me isnt a good thing cause it means tracking me where ever i go. the second thing is its about donald trump and i dont like him and yet hes on my phone, unacceptable.

attributes.title: Crashing
attributes.review: This app does work and is constantly crashing. After getting this app I now get texted 3-6 times a day to donate to the campaign. Always “ Donald trump chose you personally because you’re a special trump supporter DONATE NOW”

attributes.title: Don’t do this Trump We love TickTock
attributes.review: This is crazy there’s no reason why he should be taking down tick-tock most of our lives is on there some of us don’t have many friends so come on don’t do this to us

attributes.title: Severely disappointed
attributes.review: This app is absolute garbage it is the single worst app on the face of the earth it is offensive and rude I can’t believe apple has aloud it to stay up it is unbelievable I am absolutely and utterly mortified please for the love of god do something about it
